abstract.locale: A single tab which should be placed inside a tabs element. The user may click a tab to bring the associated page of the tabbox to the front.
Закладка в элементе tabs. Выбирая этот элемент, происходит отображение ассоциированной страницы tabbox.

description.locale: Indicates whether the element is disabled or not.
This attribute is set to true if the tab is selected by default.
Атрибут, указывающий, что закладка должна быть выбрана по умолчанию.
The label that will appear on the element. If this is left out, no text appears.
The URL of the image to appear on the element. If this attribute is empty or left out, no image appears.
This event is fired when the command is activated.
